website_summaries.verdict: Plant-based ingredients with a light white tea and lavender scent works well in high efficiency and conventional washers.
pros: Free of dyes, phosphates and brightening agents
Designed to be gentle on the skin
Works in both high efficiency and regular washing machines
2 smaller bottles instead of one large one for easier handling
cons: May not work effectively on heavily soiled clothing

customer_reviews.title: Not full-see photo
customer_reviews.text: Not only these are not full, they are not even equally filled. They both have seals and there was no sign of leaking in the box
customer_reviews.author: Jack London

customer_reviews.title: A truly gentle detergent
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Dreft for babies since my son was born almost 3 years ago. Well, after so long I wanted to try something new. My son has been allergic to many kinds so I was skeptical to switch. Well, I took a chance and this stuff is great. It's gentle on his skin and has never caused any sign of hives. It smells amazing and leaves your clothes smelling so fresh. I will definitely keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: sierra

customer_reviews.title: It works well and smells amazing!!’
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Tide for many many years because it was the only thing that my husband didn’t get an itchy rash from when I used it. I needed to use a more natural product, so I tried Gain Botanicals and really love it. The best thing is, my husband hasn’t had an adverse reaction to it. Hooray 😁
customer_reviews.author: Linda J

customer_reviews.title: Got the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: I love the original Gain solution and figured to give this product a try. Overall, it did its job, cleaning laundry for two adults. The scent was subtle (in my opinion). I paired it with the matching fabric softener, which seems to give the scent a bit of a boost when used. I liked it, but think I'll go back to regular Gain in the future for a stronger, more lasting scent.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Z.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a great deal as I thought, smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Elle ~ Guy

customer_reviews.title: Please start carrying this again...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best smelling laundry soap...I love it but it's getting harder & harder to find...Please don't stop carrying it...
customer_reviews.author: K. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: A safer choice
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin and this is my #1 choice. For sensitive skin this is one of the few that doesn't give me a rash AND smells good AND actually cleans the clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quarter missing
customer_reviews.text: I HATE that a quarter of each bottle was missing. Won’t be buying again. To be honest, this was a total waste.
customer_reviews.author: Moma J

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive for it's size.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the scent but laundry detergent was smaller than I expected.It was a bit pricey for small laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Gaelle

customer_reviews.title: 1/3 empty!
customer_reviews.text: This was a joke. The packages were only 2/3 full.
customer_reviews.author: LibbyAnn

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price and they also lasted me a good while. Took care of laundry for a month. And it’s a natural product and it’s good to know what’s going to be on my clothes
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Noel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this product only place I can now purchase. Just wish bottles were bigger. Will purchase again and again.speedy well packaged delivery
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Bennett

customer_reviews.title: not completely filled
customer_reviews.text: Love the light smell, perfect 👌 Held it up in the light so you can see its not all the eay filled. The smell is nice and light actually loving it! Not super thick like Original Gain or Tide, but I'm okay with that.
customer_reviews.author: shine43

customer_reviews.title: Could not recommend it more!
customer_reviews.text: Along with the fabric softener this is my absolute favorite!! The scent is fabulous!! Definitely recommend this! Plus it’s plant based!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica S

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this detergent thinking I would try something new. It has a great smell and works just as well as other gain products. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Not sure, but I believe I am allergic to lavender....didn’t find out until trying this detergent
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh...
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice, but doesn’t have a lasting scent. It worked well, but I prob wouldn’t buy again because I am big on the lasting good smells.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: More than a full cap full missing from both bottles. The scent is barely there. Not worth any of the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find
customer_reviews.text: Love this detergent wish I could find it more easily
customer_reviews.author: A nowell

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing and seems to have gotten my clothes clean. I was a little disappointed in how small the bottles were for the price, but that's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: It smells so good
customer_reviews.text: It smells so good I like the fact that it does come in a small bottle so it gets use less
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, But not 40 oz.
customer_reviews.text: The scent is light and nice, but the bottles arrived sealed but with almost 1/4 of the bottle empty.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi S.

customer_reviews.title: Plant based and good smell
customer_reviews.text: is not invasive and its a green product. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna

customer_reviews.title: Price, quality, quantity
customer_reviews.text: We really like this product. It doesn't have an over whelming smell just a little freshness. Buy two in a box not the bigger size it's more product less money.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: smell
customer_reviews.text: smells great but was surprised w the size...little small so double check size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite, haven’t looks back. My family has sensitivity to different detergents and this works great and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Who smells so good?
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scent that lifted my mood throughout the day. Great feel to clothing against skin.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C Pratapas

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really have much of a scent and small bottles
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product but I can get a better deal at Target than on here.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn O.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good / a little small
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery with prime Looks good , like the one I bought in store just these ones here are smaller
customer_reviews.author: Irihope

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I didnt realize these were so tiny but I guess that's my bad. The detergent works well.
customer_reviews.author: Verity

customer_reviews.title: So love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love love love...Smell amazing on clothes for days..Suds well too!!
customer_reviews.author: lovely dove

customer_reviews.title: Photo is not the size bottles you get!
customer_reviews.text: Photo shows 40 load bottles, although the listing says 50 loads for both bottles. A little misleading. These bottles are so small, I doubt we’ll even get 50 loads out of both!
customer_reviews.author: Life Of KYE

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Scent is my favorite. I use for my babys clothes. It doesn’t irritate his skin and he smells heavenly.
customer_reviews.author: Renee M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this scent!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite detergent. I wish it came in a larger bottle!
customer_reviews.author: VPersons

customer_reviews.title: Good Scent
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent of this because it’s not too strong. It cleans clothing good.
customer_reviews.author: Reeses

customer_reviews.title: So much Suds
customer_reviews.text: Way too many suds. Always required adding additional rinse. Didn’t get clothes clean
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and the fact that this detergent is plant based. The price and shipping time were both very satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the sent!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the sent of this detergent and it’s so long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent and the fact that it lasts for a while.
customer_reviews.author: tona

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing. Even works well on my sweaty gym clothes.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: White tree and lavender
customer_reviews.text: I can't find this detergent in stores great detergent works good leves are close smelling great.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is my new favorite detergent. Only tried because of the coupon I had for it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the description
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the description. It states 80 oz 2 count but they are only 40 oz bottles equaling 80 oz together. I will not be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Cutler

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I did not recieve the correct item. I recieved a baby detergent from a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenna

customer_reviews.title: It works awesome! Better than Mrs
customer_reviews.text: My children are allergic to regular detergents. We have been using Mrs. Meyers but it’s expensive. I decided to try this Gain all natural. It works awesome! Better than Mrs. Meyers and I loved that product. You only need a small amount. I always have used only a quarter cup of detergent anyway. The recommendations are always for way too much! It’s concentrated so very little is needed. The smell is really nice! It doesn’t smell strong on our clothes after washing. It’s very delicate. I like that. And none of us have had a breakout. Very happy 😃
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Ochs

customer_reviews.title: Plant Based
customer_reviews.text: First the product arrived early 😃yeah AMAZON again with your prompt service!!! I’m really amazed! I’ve been using this newer product of Gain for about 2 years. I’ve used both scents & I like both. I just needed to switch it up! I do appreciate that P&G is realizing that plant-based products are highly important to those of us who are label readers & wanting to know what we are using for our families. The White Tea & Lavender is much milder than the Orange Blossoms. If you are sensitive to smells (like me) try this one first. I believe you will be happy!!!! Oh, and the new see through green cap in much better than the previous cap.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the scent!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the scent. I love Gain products anyways. It does not take much of the Gain laundry soap to clean a whole load of clothes very while maintaining the fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WE L❤VE GAIN BOTANICALS
customer_reviews.text: I had never tried Gain laundry detergent. Ever. I was reluctant to try it, because I have sensitive skin. Knock wood, I haven't had any adverse reactions. I like that it's free of dyes, phosphates, etc., etc., etc. It does a good job of removing stains, it's gentle on my skin & the scent is long-lasting.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE PATTERSON

customer_reviews.title: Gain is a household favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fresh scent of Gain botanicals. This smells similar to the original with a hint of something more. Cleans clothes satisfactorily. TBH I don't see much difference from Gain Original, but like this detergent brand. No residue , fresh smell, clean clothes. And price point is middle of the road affordable.
customer_reviews.author: MisMissyC

customer_reviews.title: Came almost half empty
customer_reviews.text: Came almost half empty. Both bottles and the bottles are tiny
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Based on description I believed each bottle was 50 washes, not 50 washes total. Hopefully it smells amazing to make up for the fact that I would never spend that much money for the size of these bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Sylwia

customer_reviews.title: My favorite detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of this laundry detergent. The detergent cleans well and doesn't leave marks on your clothes. I have bought this before and I will continue buying it.
customer_reviews.author: smk

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful smell and definitely cleans the dirt out of my nine year olds shirts and pants have a boy that loves to play outside and get dirty
customer_reviews.author: drew rimbach

customer_reviews.title: Is everything in the pantry travel size at Amazon?
customer_reviews.text: Small size just like everything else in pantry at Amazon. $12.99 for total of 80oz (2- 40 oz bottles) at grocery store $10 for 100oz. Thought I was getting 2 bottles at 80oz each for a total of 160oz which would be a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This detergent is well worth the money. It cleans clothes and leaves a fresh smell, but not overpowering. We continue to use this product and order it from Amazon. It is shipped on time and arrives well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Plant based Laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: Product cleans as I had hoped although the dosage is a bit more than advertised. Fragrance is mild. Based on the value for the price I would not use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Eoj Oksaw

customer_reviews.title: Strong Scent
customer_reviews.text: Cleans well, but the scent is REALLY strong. I would say it's just okay for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: 1st time product...
customer_reviews.text: My first time trying this version of "gain liquid" and I most I like it. Its gentle on my skin and a gentle scent. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy at store
customer_reviews.text: Well Gain is a great product I will not buy this again from Amazon because half of it was out of the bottle and in the box by the time it arrived at my home
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent and plant-based detergent! Wish there was a bigger size, instead of the two smaller sizes. Either way- great detergent, smell, and price.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky and Suehay

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: This detergent is great smells amazing great price for this product
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells so good! It cleans well too. Only downside is the bottles are small. I ended up going to Target and found a big bottle for $8.99.
customer_reviews.author: PapillonLover

customer_reviews.title: Not full bottles
customer_reviews.text: Both bottles were a quarter empty. 1 more than the other. They were not full at all.
customer_reviews.author: Breyda Pereyra

customer_reviews.title: Great smell!!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite laundry detergent! Great at washing stains out of clothes and love the smell too! The scent lasts awhile on your clothes!
customer_reviews.author: K. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product as it works great and doesn't leave the clothes smell overly perfumed. It has only a faint smell that is very pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Natallya S.

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: Loved the scent. It didn't have my son breaking out like a lot of other detergents.
customer_reviews.author: Blanckmama

customer_reviews.title: The dogs seem to like it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a donation to our local animal shelter and they seemed pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Holley Shipp

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent and never used Gain before but I am hooked now.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Just amazing. My clothes are so soft and the scent is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: S S

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy
customer_reviews.text: Grew up on gain, wanted to try it now that I am grown. Wasnt happy with this sent or how it cleaned. Wont buy again
customer_reviews.author: Shaunda

product_meta.title: Gain Botanicals Plant Based Laundry Detergent, White Tea & Lavender, 25 Loads, 40 ounces, 2 count (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Gain Botanicals plant based detergent is specially formulated to smell irresistible and be gentle on skin. Gain Botanicals is made from 65% plant-based ingredients and is bursting with the irresistible scent of lavender. This liquid laundry detergent works in all washing machines, High Efficiency (HE) and standard (both front – and top-load). Money Back Guarantee: Love it or your money back! If you are not completely satisfied with our liquid laundry product for any reason we will give you your money back.
feature_bullets: Gain's first entry into the "natural" laundry detergent category the irresistible scent of Gain Botanicals White Tea and Lavender is made from 65% plant-based ingredients!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
